name: Fire in the Hall - Team 24
description:
Fire in the Hall is a 2D action game in top view.

 

Fire has risen a dormant caveman in a museum, Fire is his only weapon and setting Fire is his objective. Using a torch that you can throw and pick up, defend yourself from the guards of the museum and burn it all down! 

Be aware of the very valuable and flammable objects in the museum, they can bring death to your enemies and you as well. Move from one floor to the next in order to escape the museum while everything turns into ash behind you.

The game is playable with a keyboard or a controller:

Fire in the Hall was made during a Game Jam by 10 people. Our team  had to make a game in accordance with the quote : "My Precious" from "Lord of the Rings".

Build will be updated VERY SOON! 

 

Game Design
Antoine Person - Nino Barbier - Gaëtan Perré 

Programming
Thibaut Guerin  -  Julien Quentin -  Lucas Brossier - Menal Fuchs Raphael

Art

Sound

Producing
